org.melior.client.core

Class Connection<C extends ClientConfig,T extends Connection<C,T,P>,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.core.Connection<C,T,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvocationHandler, ExceptionTarget

    public abstract class Connection<C extends ClientConfig,T extends Connection<C,T,P>,P>
extends Object
implements ExceptionTarget, InvocationHandler
    Base class for connection objects that are produced by a connection factory on behalf of a remoting client. The connection objects may be pooled for improved performance.

    When pooled, a connection is aware of the connection pool from which is was borrowed, so that the connection may return itself to the connection pool when it is no longer in use.

    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Melior
    See Also:
    ConnectionFactory
